item.title: Covid19XRay
item.description: Covid19XRay Gtihub Description Image classification of Chest X Rays in one of three classes: Normal, Viral Pneumonia, COVID-19. Dataset from COVID-19 Radiography Dataset on Kaggle Libraries used: Pytorch, Pytorch Summary: Image classification of Chest X Rays in one of three classes: Normal, Viral Pneumonia, COVID-19 using Tensorflow Normalized the image by converting them into black and white images from grayscale to improve the accuracy after setting a threshold value to take care of stray white patches Obtained an error rate of 8 %
